skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I am proficient in HTML/CSS and JavaScript, and have experience in using React.js for front end.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I am skilled in object-oriented programming (Java) and take pride in crafting efficient, maintainable and testable code.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I love creating intuitive interfaces and user-friendly applications. Check out portfolio section for some of the project I've done!

skills.title: Communicaton
skills.description: My proactive approach in clarifying requirements and seeking feedback enhances coordination and project success.

portfolio.title: Chore Split
portfolio.description: ChoreSplit is an fun Android app that automates chore splitting for a group. Users can be added to multiple roommate/family groups and can collectively complete and approve each others' chores.

portfolio.title: Plasti Tag
portfolio.description: Plasti Tag is a plastic tracking app allowing user to scan bar-code for plastic products and record the kind of plastic they are using as well as for collecting data for further academic research.

portfolio.title: Image Processing
portfolio.description: An Image Processing Java CLI for Object Orient Design Class. Support multi image processing features. Importing the image via image acquisition tools; Analysing and manipulating the image; Output is an altered image.
